channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 5 Ways To Make Your Dog Happier This Year
item.description: From teaching a dog a new trick like "spin" to putting away our phones on dog walks, there are easy ways to make our dogs happy every day.

item.title: LEGO SMART Play Targets 2026 Tech Revolution, Starting With Star Wars
item.description: LEGO believes SMART Play is "one of the most significant evolutions" for the brand since the introduction of the minifigure in 1978.

item.title: 5 Ways To Make New Year’s Resolutions Last From ‘Atomic Habits’ Author James Clear
item.description: James Clear explains on the Huberman Lab podcast why habits stick through systems, identity and environment rather than sheer willpower.

item.title: ‘365 Buttons’: The Viral TikTok Meme Inspiring A New Year’s Life Motto
item.description: A cryptic comment left on a TikTok video by a user named Tamara has sparked the first big meme of 2026, a blend of silliness and self-empowerment.

item.title: Trump And RFK Jr. Change Childhood Vaccine Schedule To Align With Outlier Nation
item.description: Childhood vaccine schedules among U.S. peers differ marginally. Unlike the U.S., however, peer health officials don't sow doubt among the public about...
